text: King Ghidorah is a fictional monster who appears in movies from Japan. He first appeared in Ghidorah, the Three-Headed Monster. Since then, he has appeared in several Godzilla movies. He is a golden three-headed dragon with no arms, large wings, and two tails. He is the strongest monster in the Godzilla movies. ==Appearances== *Ghidorah, the Three-Headed Monster (1964) *Invasion of the Astro-Monster (1965) *Destroy All Monsters (1968) *Godzilla vs. Gigan (1972) *Zone Fighter (1973) *Terror of Mechagodzilla (1975) (stock footage) *Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah (1991) *Rebirth of Mothra (1996; also as "Death Ghidorah") *Godzilla Island (1997) *Rebirth of Mothra III (1998) *Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack (2001) *Godzilla: Final Wars (2004; also as "Monster X", and "Keizer Ghidorah") *Godzilla: King of the Monsters (2019) ==Other websites== * Toho Kingdom description Category:Monsters Category:Godzilla Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1960s Category:Fictional dragons Category:Fictional mass murderers Category:Supervillains
title: King Ghidorah
